hints.hintText: The past is gone, there's no way to flee. The future's the goal, the present the key.
Roses are red, the red light is you. Follow the green, that's what you must do.
The right it will lift, the left it will sink. The planes must unit like paper and ink.
The solution to the question is where your journey has started. (ALT+TAB)
Per door a room, per room a door. Whichever you open, may lock the one before.
Everything is made of smaller units, giving life to this mixture. These units will show you the bigger picture.
The number is neither phone nor IP, but you will have to use it, to contact me.
In order for you to be most effective, remember to sometimes change your perspective.
You only have xxx Seconds. Hurry and free me!.
